item.title: Missy add a quote by Anne Campbell
item.description: "You are the trip I did not take; You are the pearls I cannot buy; You are my blue Italian lake; You are my piece of foreign sky." -- Anne Campbell

item.title: Missy add a quote by Gavin de Becker
item.description: "When a baby is born the mother in particular enters into a new larger relationship with the world. She has become connected to all people. She is part of keeping us on earthnot the "us" comprised of individuals but the species itself. By protecting this one baby this gift a mother accepts life's clearest responsibility." -- Gavin de Becker

item.title: Missy add a quote by Elizabeth Stone
item.description: "Making the decision to have a child - it is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body. " -- Elizabeth Stone

item.title: Missy add a quote by Gavin de Becker
item.description: "When dreaded outcomes are actually imminent we don't worry about themwe take action. Seeing lava from the local volcano make its way down the street toward our house does not cause worry it causes running. Also we don't usually choose imminent events as subjects for our worrying and thus emerges an ironic truth: Often the very fact that you are worrying about something means that it isn't likely to happen." -- Gavin de Becker
